title: Column: What approach will new Chicago Bears GM Ryan Poles take into free agency?

title: Column: What approach will new Chicago Bears GM Ryan Poles take into free agency?

sentence: One source said the Bears could be in play for Los Angeles Rams center Brian Allen, a Hinsdale Central graduate who played at Michigan State.
author: Tribune News Service
title: Column: What approach will new Chicago Bears GM Ryan Poles take into free agency?

sentence: They were in the running to sign Los Angeles Rams center Brian Allen but couldn’t finalize a deal.

title: Column: Ryan Poles’ calculated start to free agency shows the long timeline of the Chicago Bears rebuild
